messages.title: Vote Matt Edwards For Your MP
messages.content: We need an MP who will stand up for Bradford.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Restoring our NHS, more money for our schools, fairer system for social care, decent income for pensioners.
Fairer taxes, replace council tax and business rates with a new system, reinstate free TV licenses for over-75s.
Improve insulation of every UK home by 2030, protect our green belt, invest in public transport, ban fracking.

mentions.tacticalSituation: In the last general election, 39% of people in Bradford South did not vote. That was enough to change the result.

issues.environment: Greens make green belt pledge, improve insulation of every UK home by 2030, protect our green belt, invest in public transport, ban fracking.
issues.socialWelfare: Fairer system for social care, decent income for pensioners.

community.content: Seven months to fix a wall? Matt Edwards has reported a damaged wall to Bradford Council again – seven months after it was first reported.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am standing in this election because Bradford deserves better – especially places like Tong Ward. We have been let down for too long and it's time for change. If elected, I will make fixing our roads and ideas for our area that you want to see my priority.

examples: Seven months to fix a wall?
39% of people in Bradford South did not vote in the last general election.
Matt Edwards: Here all year, not just at election time.
We need an MP who will stand up for Bradford.
Matt has been meeting people across Bradford South over the last few years and made sure that he has campaigned on the issues that are important to you.
Seven months to fix a wall?
39% of people in Bradford South did not vote in the last general election.
